price: او د هغوى (كافرانو) ورونه (شيطانان) دوى په كږه لار كې راكاږي او بيا هېڅ لنډون (سستي) نه كوي.
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'wānuhum yamuddūnahum fī al-ghayi thumma lā yuq'ṣirūna
